name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 21: The Yakyuu - Pro Yakyuu Jitsumeiban
summary: Simple 1500 Series Vol.21 - The Yakyuu - Pro Yakyuu Jitsumei-ban is a baseball simulation game featuring players detailed data, and the player can design the team tactics, trade players, etc. The game features also a 2 players vs mode using a save of a team in the main game.
